title: Basin in the West Candor Chasma Layered Deposits
description: This basin in Ceti Mensa exposes concentric rings in the sedimentary layers. Dark sand ripples and textures in the bedrock suggesting wind scouring are also apparent.
theme:
MARS. The Red Planet, one of the most desirable
destinations for humanity
